mapr.master

Class MasterCoordinatorServeConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • mapr.master.MasterCoordinatorServeConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MasterCoordinatorServeConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Runnable class that handles all connection requests to Master node.
    Author:
    Derek Tzeng

      • startJob

        public int startJob(java.lang.String jobType,
           java.lang.String user,
           java.lang.String filename,
           int start,
           int end,
           java.lang.String output,
           java.lang.String otherArgs)
        Inserts a job to the QueuedTasks of a worker node.
        Parameters:
        jobType - Type of the job, e.g. `grep` or `wordcount`
        user - User node that created the job
        filename - Input file name
        start - Starting record index
        end - Ending record index
        output - Output file name
        otherArgs - User Additional command-line arguments fed in by the user.
        Returns:
        JobID for new job
